org.albertschmitt.crypto

Class RSAService

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.albertschmitt.crypto.RSAService

  • public class RSAService
extends java.lang.Object
    This class implements RSA private/public key encryption with a 2048 bit key using the Bouncy Castle API. Clients can use this class to easily incorporate encryption into their applications. Note when converting between strings and byte arrays clients should be sure to convert using the UTF-8 character set.

    External Dependencies: Bouncy Castle Release 1.52

    • bcpkix-jdk15on.jar
    • bcprov-jdk15on.jar
    Version:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Albert Schmitt [acschmit] [at] [gmail] [dot] [com]

      • generateKey

        public void generateKey(java.lang.String private_filename,
                        java.lang.String public_filename)
        Generate a Public / Private RSA key pair and write them to the designated file names.
        Parameters:
        private_filename - The file name to which the RSA Private Key will be written.
        public_filename - The file name to which the RSA Public Key will be written.

      • areKeysPresent

        public boolean areKeysPresent(java.lang.String private_filename,

        Checks for the existence of the RSA Private and Public Key and returns true if they exist or false if they don't.
        Parameters:
        private_filename - The file containing the RSA Private Key.
        public_filename - The file containing the RSA Public Key.
        Returns:
        True if the key pair exist false if they do not.
